product_name: Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus Sleeping Pad - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This 4-season ProLite Plus sleeping pad offers lightweight, self-inflating convenience and has extra insulation to help keep you warm while ski touring, cold-weather expeditions and winter camping.
short_description: This 4-season ProLite Plus sleeping pad offers lightweight, self-inflating convenience and has extra insulation to help keep you warm while ski touring, cold-weather expeditions and winter camping.
